meanings.definition: Not involving or relating to sight.
meanings.sent1: The radio provides a nonvisual way to enjoy music.
meanings.sent2: The nonvisual experience of listening to a podcast is different from watching a video.
meanings.sent3: It was a nonvisual puzzle, requiring only touch to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her nonvisual description of the sunset painted a vivid picture in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The nonvisual world of sound and touch can be just as beautiful as the visual world.

meanings.definition: Unable to be seen or perceived visually.
meanings.sent1: Ultraviolet light is nonvisual to the human eye.
meanings.sent2: The nonvisual presence of ghosts is often felt rather than seen.
meanings.sent3: The nonvisual magic trick left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: His nonvisual talent for storytelling made his words come alive.
meanings.sent5: The nonvisual realm of emotions can be just as powerful as what we see.
